title: George Olwande Odindo
text: George Olwande Odindo (born 12 October 1971) is a Kenyan <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202000%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20heavyweight">men's light heavyweight</a> event at the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a>.
